snippet: On Monday, Mike Lynch, the founder of the British software company Autonomy, set up AutonomyAccounts.org, a Web site meant to house his responses to the controversy swirling around his former company.
abstract: On Monday, Mike Lynch, the founder of the British software company Autonomy, set up AutonomyAccounts.org, a Web site meant to house his responses to the controversy swirling around his former company.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Taking His Fight Against H.P. to the Web
